span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;

    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;

    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {

}
.pkg-exc ul li {

}

<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Best of Mizoram Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/mizoram-tour-packages" title="Mizoram Tour Packages">Mizoram</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Best of Mizoram Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3cb5457b99_12928716" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/best-of-mizoram.jpg" alt="Best of Mizoram Tour Package" title="Best of Mizoram Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Mizoram, a beautiful hill station is studded with innumerable tourist attractions which one can explore during a week-long journey. Mizoram is considered to be the remotest Indian state and the journey to this state commences from Guwahati. Our 5 Nights / 6 Days long itinerary has been designed in such a way that it covers all the rolling hills and the lush Green Valleys bestowing Aizawl and other destination that come under the package. From Aizawl, you will proceed towards the Mc Donald hill where one can reach via covering the trekking trail. Afterward, we will be visiting the other attractions of the state like Reiek Mountain and the local villages.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Best of Mizoram Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Guwahati</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>On your arrival at Guwahati Airport, you will be greeted by our tour representative. After a warm welcome, he will escort you in transferring to the hotel where you will be staying overnight. After reaching there, check-in at the hotel, loosen up yourself and then after relaxing for a few hours you can either stroll relax in the evening or can make a visit to Srimanta Sankardev Kalakshetra and make your evening special. Also, participate in the cultural gusto for which this particular state is famous for. Return to the hotel after the completion of your first-day schedule and enjoy the scrumptious night meal and go for a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Guwahati – Aizawl</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Early in the morning after a hurried breakfast, check out from the hotel and drive towards Guwahati Airport to board the flight to Aizawl. On reaching Lengpui Airport in Aizawl, our representative will transfer you to the pre-booked lodge or hotel. After a few hours, visit the Bara Bazar one of the most popular shopping centers in this beautiful northeastern state in India. This is the most preferred shopping place from where tourists bring back the souvenirs for their family and friends.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Aizawl – Hmuifang Mountains – Aizawl</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Post a hearty breakfast check-out from the hotel and drive towards Hmuifang Waterfalls. En-route Hmuifang Waterfalls from Aizawl you will be visiting the Center of Excellence and the Heritage Site in Thika. Post a scrumptious afternoon meal at the resort you will drive towards the nest destination of the journey. Visit Vantawng Waterfalls and Hmuifang Waterfalls at Thenzawl which is believed to be the highest waterfall in the state. After completing a fun-filled day return to the accommodation and enjoy the night meal which will be followed by an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Aizawl – Mc Donald Hill</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>After an unhurried breakfast, proceed towards the first destination of the day on Mc Donald Hill i.e. State Museum. Explore the different handicrafts and handlooms centers in the city and then take a break for lunch. Drive towards the ATC, Durtlang from where they get the panoramic views of the entire city. Later in the evening return to the hotel for dinner and then overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Aizawl – Lungleng – Khuangchera Caves – Reiek Mountain – Aizawl</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Post a lavish breakfast in the hotel you will hit the roads to Lungleng Village where you will be exploring the Lungleng Chieftain which is a popular Heritage home. After visiting Chieftain returns to the hotel for lunch and then drive towards Reiek. En-route Reiek Mountain explores the popular Khuangchera Cave and then go to the top of the hill from where you get the beautiful views of the entire city. Leave towards Aizawl for staying overnight at the pre-booked accommodation.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Aizawl – Kolkata/Delhi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display:none">
<p>Post a relishing breakfast at the accommodation pack up your bags and then drive towards the Lengpui Airport from where you board the flight towards home.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Mizoram Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Best Season To Visit Mizoram?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The best months to visit Mizoram are November to March because the weather is pleasant and sightseeing is enjoyable. During these months, the temperature ranges from 11°C to 30°C.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Mizoram Famous For?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Mizoram is located in the southernmost tip of north east India and is known for its evergreen hills and dense bamboo jungles. The hills, known as the Land of Blue Mountains, are crisscrossed by gushing rivers and high sparkling waterfalls.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Mizoram Item Is Well-Known?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Mizoram has some excellent weavers who produce intricately beautiful items. These traditionally skilled artisans weave shawls as well as bamboo baskets, utensils, hats, Handcrafted Furniture, and flower vases. The state's most prominent crafts are cane and bamboo handicrafts.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Mizoram's Most Famous Sweet?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The Mizo people do not have any sweet dishes other than one special banana cake. The main ingredients of this unique cake, known as Koat Pitha, are bananas, Jaggery, and rice flour.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Mizoram's Most Famous Drink?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> You should try their two popular drinks while in Mizoram. Zu, or the local tea, is one of them. They drink it with almost every meal. The second is the Labrusca Grape Wine, which is also a local favourite.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Best of Mizoram Tour Package Home » India » Mizoram » Best of Mizoram Tour Package Tour Overview Mizoram, a beautiful hill station is studded with innumerable tourist attractions which one can explore during a week-long journey. Mizoram is considered to be the remotest Indian state and the journey to this state commences from Guwahati....
